system.description:
Dragonshards are used as sources of magical power for crafting and powering magic items and as material components when conducting rituals (see @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc.JournalEntry.swadefcp04arcana.JournalEntryPage.04preparedpowe00#ritual-magic]{Ritual Magic} in the Savage Worlds Fantasy Companion). An unattuned dragonshard has Hardness 10. The process of attunement softens a stone slightly, reducing its Hardness to 8.
[[1d8]]{Price}

[Note: You can overwrite the cost of the dragonshard with the price generated above to randomly determine the price of this specific shard.]
